articles.author: Sarah Palmer
articles.title: 'Hold off from having kids,' warns AI expert Mo Gawdat - Euronews
articles.description: The ex-chief business officer at Google X has issued a terrifying warning about the dangers of AI in a podcast interview.
articles.content:
The ex-chief business officer at Google X has issued a terrifying warning about the dangers of AI in a podcast interview.
